Re: Jeffrey Epstein 19 cr 490 From: James Petrucci To: Lee Plourde Date: 2019/08/14 17:44 Subject: Re: Jeffrey Epstein 19 cr 490 Attachments: TEXT.htm Thanks Lee. Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone -------- Original message -------- From: Lee Plourde [b6]@bop.gov Date: 8/14/19 17:41 (GMT-05:00) To: James Petrucci [b6]@bop.gov Subject: Fwd: Jeffrey Epstein 19 cr 490 >>> "Lee Plourde" 08/14/2019 17:41 >>> Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone -------- Original message -------- From: [b6]@[bop.gov](mailto:b6@bop.gov) Date: 8/14/19 5:29 PM (GMT-05:00) To: Lee Plourde [b6]@bop.gov, James Petrucci [b6]@bop.gov Subject: Fwd: Jeffrey Epstein 19 cr 490 >>> [b6], [b7](C) 08/14/2019 17:29 >>> Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone
-------- Original message --------
From: [b6], [b7](C) @bop.gov
Date: 8/12/
To: [b6], [b7](C) @nysd.uscourts.gov
Cc: [b6], [b7](C) @nysd.uscourts.gov
Subject: Re: Jeffrey Epstein 19 cr 490
>>
> [b6], [b7](C) @bop.gov 08/12/2019 14:44 >>>
Dear Judge Berman, I will be happy to do so. Please let me know if I can be of further assistance. Thank you, [b6], [b7](C) Supervisory Staff Attorney CLC New York Metropolitan Correctional Center 150 Park Row New York, New York 10007 p: (646)836[b6] f: (646)836-7665 >>> [b6], [b7](C) @nysd.uscourts.gov 8/12/2019 2:42 PM >>> please thank the Warden for his prompt response to my letter. Richard M. Berman On Aug 12, 2019, at 2:37 PM, Christine Murray [b6], [b7](C) @nysd.uscourts.gov wrote: fyi ----- Forwarded by Christine Murray/NYSD/02/USCOURTS on 08/12/2019 02:37 PM ----- From: [b6], [b7](C) @bop.gov To: "Lamine N'Diaye" [b6]@bop.gov, , [b6]@nysd.uscourts.gov, [b6], [b7](C) @nysd.uscourts.gov, [b6], [b7](C) @usdoj.gov Cc: [b6]@att.net, [b6], [b7](C) @nysd.uscourts.gov, [b6], [b7](C) @usdoj.gov Date: 08/12/2019 02:33 PM Subject: Re: Jeffrey Enstein 19 cr 490 Page 1612 DOJ-OGR-00024189

Re: Jeffrey Epstein 19 cr 490
From: James Petrucci
To: Lee Plourde
Date: 2019/08/14 17:44
Subject: Re: Jeffrey Epstein 19 cr 490
Attachments: TEXT.htm

-------- Original message --------
From: Lee Plourde [b6]@bop.gov
Date: 8/14/19 17:41 (GMT-05:00)
To: James Petrucci [b6]@bop.gov
Subject: Fwd: Jeffrey Epstein 19 cr 490

-------- Original message --------
From: [b6]@[bop.gov](mailto:b6@bop.gov)
Date: 8/14/19 5:29 PM (GMT-05:00)
To: Lee Plourde [b6]@bop.gov, James Petrucci [b6]@bop.gov
Subject: Fwd: Jeffrey Epstein 19 cr 490

>>> [b6], [b7](C) 08/14/2019 17:29 >>>
Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone

-------- Original message --------
From: [b6], [b7](C) @bop.gov
Date: 8/12/
To: [b6], [b7](C) @nysd.uscourts.gov
Cc: [b6], [b7](C) @nysd.uscourts.gov
Subject: Re: Jeffrey Epstein 19 cr 490
>>
> [b6], [b7](C) @bop.gov 08/12/2019 14:44 >>>

Dear Judge Berman,

I will be happy to do so. Please let me know if I can be of further assistance.

Thank you,
[b6], [b7](C)
Supervisory Staff Attorney
CLC New York
Metropolitan Correctional Center
150 Park Row
New York, New York 10007
p: (646)836[b6]
f: (646)836-7665

>>> [b6], [b7](C) @nysd.uscourts.gov 8/12/2019 2:42 PM >>>
please thank the Warden for his prompt response to my letter.
Richard M. Berman

On Aug 12, 2019, at 2:37 PM, Christine Murray [b6], [b7](C) @nysd.uscourts.gov wrote:

fyi

----- Forwarded by Christine Murray/NYSD/02/USCOURTS on 08/12/2019 02:37 PM -----
From: [b6], [b7](C) @bop.gov
To: "Lamine N'Diaye" [b6]@bop.gov, <BermanNYSDChambers@nysd.uscourts.gov>, [b6]@nysd.uscourts.gov, [b6], [b7](C) @nysd.uscourts.gov, [b6], [b7](C) @usdoj.gov
Cc: [b6]@att.net, [b6], [b7](C) @nysd.uscourts.gov, [b6], [b7](C) @usdoj.gov
Date: 08/12/2019 02:33 PM
Subject: Re: Jeffrey Enstein 19 cr 490

additional_notes: The document is an email chain with multiple redactions, primarily related to the Jeffrey Epstein case. The emails discuss responses and actions taken regarding the case, involving various individuals and government agencies.
